src.java.searchengine.searchenginebuilders

Class SearchEngineBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.java.searchengine.searchenginebuilders.SearchEngineBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExplicitFeedBackEngineBuilder, FreqQueryWordsBuilder, ImplicitFeedBackEngineBuilder, NormalizedSearchEngineBuilder, QueryExpansionEngineBuilder, WordsInDocBuilder

    public abstract class SearchEngineBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    This abstract class serves as a starting point for the an implementation of the builder pattern with the purpose of creating an instance of a SearchEngine. A SearchEngine object needs several components to work, all of them can be changed and replaced to create a different kind of SearchEngine, as so, this object type of can have many representations, so in order to separate it's representation from it's construction a builder pattern was applied.
    Since:
    10-16-2017

    • Constructor Detail

      • SearchEngineBuilder

        public SearchEngineBuilder(InvertedIndex invertedIndex,
                           Tokenizer tokenizer,
                           QueryIndex queryIndex,
                           DocumentIndex documentIndex,
                           double threshold)
        A super constructor for all the class that will derive this class.
        Parameters:
        invertedIndex - An InvertedIndex object to be provided to the searchEngine.
        tokenizer - A Tokenizer to be provided to the QueryReader object.
        queryIndex - A QueryIndex with the queries to be processed.
        threshold - The minimum values of the result scores.
        documentIndex - A DocumentIndex with the document vectors
